text: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡحُكۡمَ وَٱلنُّبُوَّةَ وَرَزَقۡنَٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَٰتِ وَفَضَّلۡنَٰهُمۡ عَلَى ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

translation.en: And We did certainly give the Children of Israel the Scripture and judgement and prophethood, and We provided them with good things and preferred them over the worlds
translation.id: Dan sungguh, kepada Bani Israil telah Kami berikan Kitab (Taurat), kekuasaan dan kenabian, Kami anugerahkan kepada mereka rezeki yang baik, dan Kami lebihkan mereka atas bangsa-bangsa (pada masa itu)
